portalLayout.brandDescription: Jobs, follow-ups, notes, photos, and full invoice tracking.
portalLayout.quickAddDescription: Add an organic lead and schedule in one flow.
portalLayout.onboardingPausedDescription: Finish setup to unlock full scheduling and go-live checks.

today.title: Today
today.subtitle: Mobile-first command view for today.
today.followUpsSubtitle: Upcoming and overdue follow-ups for this workspace.
today.openJobsSubtitle: Project folders that still need action.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Update SMS and follow-up preferences for {organizationName}.
settings.missedCallPlaceholderEn: Hey! Sorry we missed your call. Reply here and we can still help.
settings.missedCallPlaceholderEs: Hola, perdona que perdimos tu llamada. Responde aquí y todavía te podemos ayudar.
settings.intakeAskLocationPlaceholderEn: What city are you located in?
settings.intakeAskWorkTypePlaceholderEn: What type of work do you need done?
settings.intakeAskCallbackPlaceholderEn: What day/time works best for a callback or estimate?
settings.intakeAskCallbackPlaceholderEs: ¿Qué día/hora te funciona para una llamada o estimado?
settings.intakeCompletionPlaceholderEn: Perfect, you're set for {{time}}. We'll follow up then.
settings.intakeCompletionPlaceholderEs: Perfecto, te agendamos para {{time}}. Te contactamos entonces.
settings.allowWorkerLeadCreate: Allow workers to create organic leads
settings.allowWorkerLeadCreateNote: Only owner/admin/internal users can change worker lead-entry permissions.
settings.ghostTemplateDefault: Hey {{name}}, just checking in. We can still help with your project whenever you're ready. Reply here and we can lock in next steps.
settings.automationFlagsNote: Only owner/admin/internal users can change automation feature flags.

errors.invalidSender: Enter a valid E.164 sender number.
errors.invalidMessageLanguage: Choose a valid automated message language.
errors.invalidMessage: Message must be 1600 characters or less.
errors.invalidReminder: Reminder must be between 15 and 1440 minutes.
errors.invalidReviewUrl: Review link must be a valid URL.
errors.invalidCalendarTimezone: Calendar timezone must be a valid IANA timezone.
errors.invalidUserTimezone: Your timezone must be a valid IANA timezone.
errors.invalidGhostHours: Ghost Busting quiet hours must use a valid HH:MM time.
errors.invalidGhostMax: Ghost Busting max nudges must be between 1 and 10.
errors.invalidGhostTemplate: Ghost Busting template must be 1600 characters or less.
